sentences.en: a speech full of rhetorical phrases
Accepted two or three verbal and rhetorical changes I suggested.
sentences.cn: 接受了我所建议的两三个措辞和修辞修改.

sentences.en: By 2000 B . C , Babylonian arithmetic had evolved into a well - developed rhetorical, or prose, algebra.
sentences.cn: 大约在公元前2000年, 巴比伦算术已经演化成为一种高度发展的用文字叙述的代数学.

sentences.en: He could do without her rhetorical questions at five o'clock in the morning.
sentences.cn: 他真不愿早上5点就听到她一遍遍地反问。

sentences.en: He grimaced slightly, obviously expecting no answer to his rhetorical question.
sentences.cn: 他微微皱了下眉头，显然并不期待任何人回答他的反问。

sentences.en: Her queries were rhetorical, and best ignored.
sentences.cn: 她的质问只不过是说说而已, 最好不予理睬.

sentences.en: If I am rhetorical it was because Stroeve was rhetorical.
sentences.cn: 如果我在这里有些舞文弄墨,这是因为施特略夫当时就是这么表达他自己的.

sentences.en: It is a style which I have deliberately abandoned as too rhetorical.
sentences.cn: 这种文体风格我因为它过分藻饰华丽已经存心放弃了.

sentences.en: Most readers are likely to lose interest when he descends into the realms of rhetorical terminology.
sentences.cn: 他开始讨论修辞术语,大多数读者很可能会失去兴趣.

sentences.en: That was for the splendours of the recent past ; and for rhetorical and ornamental language.
sentences.cn: 那是对往日繁华的向往以及对于修辞和华丽辞藻的爱好.

sentences.en: The healing power of art is not a rhetorical fantasy.
sentences.cn: 艺术的治愈力量并非夸大其词的幻想.

sentences.en: The writer showed great rhetorical skill.
sentences.cn: 该作者显示出非常出色的修辞技巧.

sentences.en: These are not rhetorical questions – you will answer with your policies.
sentences.cn: 这些并非修辞性问句--你们将以你们的对策来回答.

sentences.en: This is for the splendours of the recent past, and for rhetorical and ornamental language.
sentences.cn: 这是由于对往日繁华的向往以及对于修辞和华丽辞藻的爱好.

sentences.en: Those are rhetorical questions I'm not supposed to answer, right?
sentences.cn: 这些都是我不该回答的反问句，对吧？

sentences.en: You don't expect me to answer rhetorical questions?
sentences.cn: 你不会想要我回答这种反问句 吧 ?
